title: The Grand Duke
tags: how to unlock the grand duke
content:
then make your way to the Flymm Cargo. You may need to use Thieves' Tools to enter through the doors. This will begin a battle. After you've cleared the area, head to the basement. The Hatch to Flymm Cargo is hidden beneath some crates, at X-163, Y-143. Alternatively, you can reach Flymm Cargo basement through City Sewers.

There will be a door ahead to the Detention Block which will lead you to the Submersible that will take you to the Iron Throne. As you approach the submersible, someone may c
